title: Day 08 : 22 July 2002 (8 entries)
content: Just wondering, why don't you post all the submissions you get?
author: gouom

comments.content: I was just wondering that myself?
Is it just me, or does the chemist in design 08.006 look like Mr Rogers?

It's all my fault! I'm totally swamped trying to hit a deadline - I'll post Day 5 soon, I promise!   
   
jb

I really like the Mr Rogers-Chemist. I think the back should have the type in red and white like the front though. It stands out, off the blue better.   
   
Jared, no worries, thanks for an explanation.
